text:
I worked on something extremely cool with @mitchellh for his newly released terminal app, Ghostty.

We didn’t just design a neat app icon—we created a fully customizable system that lets users craft icons to match their terminal themes perfectly. https://t.co/22ywjRL3qD
embed_code:
I worked on something extremely cool with @mitchellh for his newly released terminal app, Ghostty. We didn’t just design a neat app icon—we created a fully customizable system that lets users craft icons to match their terminal themes perfectly. https://t.co/22ywjRL3qD

— Michael Flarup (@flarup) Dec 30, 2024
